TopicTitle: Best way to attach a rover.

Articles.Content: Hello y'all. This is my first post on the forums. I am fairly new to KSP and have landed on the Mun and Minmus but am wanting to put a rover on them. That being said i am having a hard time attaching a rover to my lander. I was hoping to get some tips. Thanks
The way I would do it would be to have radial mounted engines or radially mounted fuel tanks with your normal engines and have the rover hanging underneath.

I'm about to launch my own version of Brotoro's Vall rover nad I'm just going to treat it like any other payload. Stick it on the top of a rocket and pray it doesn't fall apart. (It shouldn't, I dropped the think from about 50m up and all it did was break wheels.)
